name: resolution
description: Image Resolution, optional, defaults to devices capability

name: storage
description: Storage type eg. s3,dropBox,gdrive etc, Mandatory

name: orientation
description: Orientation of screen eg. landscape or portrait, optional. defaults to landscape

name: platformPercentage
description: Default platform eg. Number of object upload required in %

name: focusDepth
description: Will work if autofocus is off

name: ratio
description: possible ratios supported by the camera that can be retieved from RNCamera library (only Android)

name: whiteBalance
description: and for IOS we can specify custom temperature, tint and rgb offset values {temperature: 4000, tint: -10.0, redGainOffset: 0.0, greenGainOffset: 0.0, blueGainOffset: 0.0}
